mapper.select: select sum(sales_total)as totalSales,sum(cust_number)as totalNum,avg(average_price)as totalAvg,totalGoods from sale as sa left join (select COUNT(DISTINCT goods_code) as totalGoods,store_code from goods where store_code=#{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as gd on sa.store_code=gd.store_code where sa.store_code=#{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
